Summary: Bright Object Above Soccer Field With Plane above it
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the bleachers at my girlfriends soccer game when i kick went astray and the ball rolled off the field past and behind the bleachers. I turned around to follow the ball and out of the the corner of my eye I noticed a bright object hovering (seemingly) above the farther soccer field in the park. At first I thought its just a plane flying towards me but a few seconds later to the objects Northeast (assuming the top of the object is North on a compass) I noticed the signature flashing lights of a plane fly right past the object. The plane was incredibly small compared to the object that was hovering. I continued to watch the object for about 4 more minutes in which it did not move at all until it suddenly blinked out and I turned back to the game. It is interesting enough to note that the soccer fields are right across the street from an abandoned air base (which is now a retirement home complex).
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
